column5: With a comfortable and cozy bedroom and a bathroom next to your room, our goal is that your stay is comfortable! In true southern fashion, we leave a cast iron skillet on the stove. And we have two large playful black labs who live here. We are located across street from Frisco, TX. Our home is close to Toyota Stadium, Shops at Legacy, Stonebriar Center, The Dallas Cowboys Star, Lewisville Lake, etc. So much to do around here!
